Project Id and filename to specify the file for deletion. The /files/delete API accepts requests in the following format:

DeleteFileRequest Model - Request to delete a file in a project.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project that contains the file.
name string
required
The name of the file to delete.
codeSourceId string
Name of the environment that's creating the request.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "name": "string",
  "codeSourceId": "string"
}
